remarks: For any element in the range of a function there is an element in the domain of the function for which the function value is the element of the range.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 8-Dec-2017.)
statement:
elrnrexdm $p |- ( Fun F -> ( Y e. ran F -> E. x e. dom F Y = ( F ` x ) ) ) $.
$d F x $.
$d Y x $.
